site.title: PsychePedia
site.subtitle: The Psychology Encyclopedia
site.description: A comprehensive academic wiki for psychology students

hero.title: The Psychology Encyclopedia
hero.subtitle: Your comprehensive resource for psychological science
hero.description: Explore foundational concepts, clinical applications, and research methods across all domains of psychology. Written for students, by a student.

domains.title: Explore Domains
domains.subtitle: Comprehensive coverage of all major areas in psychological science

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Coverage
comprehensive.description: All major domains of psychology covered in depth

foundations.title: Foundations of Psychology
foundations.description: Core concepts, history, research methods, and ethical principles

cognitive.title: Cognitive & Affective
cognitive.description: Memory, learning, emotion, motivation, and thinking

developmental.title: Developmental Psychology
developmental.description: Lifespan development from childhood through aging

social-personality.title: Social & Personality
social-personality.description: Social behavior, personality theories, and cultural psychology

applied.title: Applied Psychology
applied.description: Forensic, I/O, educational, and sports psychology

new-and-now.title: New & Now
new-and-now.description: Cutting-edge research and emerging trends in psychology

positive.title: Positive Psychology
positive.description: Well-being, happiness, character strengths, and human flourishing

consumer-environmental.title: Consumer & Environmental
consumer-environmental.description: Consumer behavior, marketing psychology, and environmental psychology

relationships-family.title: Relationships & Family
relationships-family.description: Attachment, romantic relationships, and parenting psychology

gender-sexuality.title: Gender & Sexuality
gender-sexuality.description: Psychology of gender, sexual identity, and human sexuality

experiments.title: Interactive Tests
experiments.description: Engage with psychological concepts through interactive tests and experiments

footer.tagline: Empowering psychology students with comprehensive, accessible knowledge.

common.notFoundDesc: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

experiments.title: Interactive Experiments
experiments.description: Practice with psychological assessment tools and cognitive experiments. These simulations are designed for educational purposes to help psychology students learn about psychological testing, scoring, and interpretation.
experiments.educationalNote: These tools are educational simulations for psychology students to learn about assessment instruments. They are not diagnostic tools.

stroopTest.title: Stroop Effect
stroopTest.description: Test your reaction time and attention with this classic cognitive experiment.

motionDetection.title: Motion Detection
motionDetection.description: Test your ability to detect subtle movements and changes in visual stimuli.

brainExplorer.title: Brain Explorer
brainExplorer.description: Explore the brain's structure and function through an interactive 3D model.
